amendment.description: At the end of division F (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. XXX. For "Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration-Substance Abuse Treatment" ***.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 182 printed in House Report 115-297 to provide $10,000,000 to the Controlled Substance Monitoring Program, per 42 U.S.C 280g-3. The amendment is offset by a reduction in the Office of the Secretary, General Department Management for $10,000,000.
